snippet.title: GLASSHOUSE  - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
WISHLIST NOW!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2244700/Glasshouse/

"COPS DON'T BARK" Demo is available on ITCH.IO: https://flat28-collective.itch.io/glasshouseconcept

"Welcome to Apartment 28, where tongues are burned and nerves tested. Choose your words carefully, protect your ideologies and survive the lockdown, with or without your housemates."

FLAT28 is a collective.
Without borders.
Without budget.
Join us.
